Command *checkpriv*
********************

Documentation for the checkpriv command in */trans/cmds/checkpriv.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE:  ``checkpriv < privilege >``

This command will tell you whether or not you have a certain privilege.

``checkpriv 1``
will check if you have priv 1 (ie admin)
